verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Zanaka adala,
Tompo malala,
Mba raiso aho
Ho mpanomponao
Ny halemena
Aza jerena :
Hiverina aho
Ka amindrao fo.
Ovay ho vao.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Tsy tafandry (Mitoetra tsy tafandry)
fa miandry (Fa efa ela no niandry)
Ilay sandry (manantena ilay sandrinao)
Hitondra ahy, Ã´ ! avia, (Miantso aho hoe : Avia !)
Mpamonjy tia, (Malakia Mpamonjy tia)
Hiaraka aminao aho, aho

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Fa manantena
Ny famonjena,
Tompo malala aho izao
Mba omeo hery
Ho sahy hijery
'Lay lanitra
Sy tany vao
Fiandriananao
Tsy tafandry, sns.
